name: Tower Madness (kuroo)
description:
A Bullet Hell game using enemy's bullet and put it in your tower to destroy the tower

"WE USED THE TOWER TO DESTROY THE TOWER"

Our Teams

-Designer-
Mujiburrahman Haekal Fajry

-Programmer
Robertus Dwi Ari Utomo

-Artist-
Bayu Reza Gunawan
Ezra Reihardian Sihotang
Mujiburrahman Haekal Fajry

ControlWASDMovementEPut and Take TowerSPACETake BulletESCPause & Unpause

Note:
You have to pay attention to your tower, your tower can overheat and it will stop functioning until it cools down again. The icon bar on the right will help you to see your tower's overheating status.

Seaside Studios - Asset Store (unity.com)
